section.title: Description
section.p: "A list of maximum fees for providers who are on a fee-for-service basis." -eHealthInsurance.org

stentry.p: The amount of money that may be paid for the performance of a set of services related to the given diagnosis group.

Identifies a service such as an office visit, test, procedure, or provision of medications which may be billed or reimbursed. Payments are typically issued retrospectively, after the services are provided. Billable services are typically identified by a procedure code such as a Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code.
